title: Signal fault causing delays on Circle Line

title_translations.zh-Hans: 信号故障导致环线延误
title_translations.ms: Gangguan isyarat menyebabkan kelewatan di Laluan Lingkaran
title_translations.ta: வட்டப் பாதையில் தாமதத்தை ஏற்படுத்தும் சமிக்ஞைக் கோளாறு

updates.text: [CCL] CLEARED: Train services between #one-north and #HarbourFront are now operating normally.
[CCL]UPDATE: Fault is cleared. Expect longer travelling time between #one-north and #HarbourFront. Trains and platforms are crowded.
[CCL]: Estimate 15 mins additional travelling time between #one-north and #HarbourFront in both directions due to signal fault.
